name: Customer billing inquiry
user_prompt: When asked for name, provide or confirm you are Jane Smith. When asked for account number, say 12345. Say you're confused about a charge on your recent bill and ask for help understanding it.
metrics: Agent greeted the customer, addressed the billing concern, and was helpful and professional.

name: Technical support request
user_prompt: When asked for name, say Bob Johnson. When asked about the issue, say your Model X smartphone won't turn on. You've tried charging it overnight. Show frustration if the conversation goes too long without resolution.
metrics: Agent acknowledged the technical issue, attempted to troubleshoot, and remained calm despite user frustration.
